definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: This weather plays the devil with my aching joints.
sentences.chinese: 这种鬼天气让我的关节很痛。

sentences.english: A bad day has accompanied with bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 倒霉的一天在鬼天气的伴随中到来。

sentences.english: Christian : God, I hate the snow.
sentences.chinese: 上帝，我讨厌这下雪的鬼天气。
这鬼天气实在是太热了。

sentences.english: I'd hate to bail out in this snowstorm .
sentences.chinese: 我可不想在这种鬼天气里跳伞。

sentences.english: Hated the bad weather, did you?
It is a terrible and hot day.
It was a beautiful day, because the ghost weather and become monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 本来美好的一天，就因为这鬼天气而变得单调。

definition: chilled to the bone/(of the wind) chilly
to trend/to get popular quickly/sudden heat wave (weather)
three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)
